## Connection.(constructor)

Establish a JSON RPC connection

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(endpoint: string, commitment?: Commitment);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  endpoint | string | URL to the fullnode JSON RPC endpoint |
|  commitment | [Commitment](./web3.js.commitment.md) | optional default commitment level |
